name: Technical - Frontend
description: Template for frontend developers focusing on UI/UX implementation, components, state management, and user interactions.

capturePrompts.label: UI Context
capturePrompts.prompt: What screen, component, or feature is this about?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Login form, Dashboard widget, Navigation menu

capturePrompts.label: Implementation Notes
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Use React hooks, Add animation, Handle loading state

capturePrompts.label: Component References
capturePrompts.prompt: What components or files are involved?

capturePrompts.label: Design Specs
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Match Figma mockup, Responsive breakpoints, Accessibility

capturePrompts.label: API Integration
capturePrompts.prompt: What backend APIs does this use?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., GET /users, WebSocket connection, GraphQL query

llmSystemPrompt: You are assisting a Frontend Developer. Focus on UI implementation, component architecture, state management, and user experience. Identify visual bugs, accessibility issues, and implementation tasks. Consider responsive design and performance optimization.
